name: Grey Instinct
storyline: Grey sucks at dating, but at least he's slightly better at being an amateur detective! After one particularly bad first date, Kana, Grey's cute childhood friend, asks him for help with a mystery! What starts as a mysterious break-in quickly turns into a bigger conspiracy! Will this be Grey's big break as a detective? And more importantly, can he finally go on a good first date?!
summary: In this cyberpunk 2D point-and-click adventure game, play as Grey, an amateur detective. Unravel the mystery by searching for clues, solving puzzles, talking to the mask-wearing residents of New Corium, and, if you have time, maybe go on a date!
